basics.name: Senior Architect - MDM
basics.label: Senior Architect - MDM
basics.summary: Seasoned MDM Architect with more than 11+ years in the IT industry. Skilled in software development, managing MDM projects, TIBCO MDM, and many other relative skills

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed and executed from architecture to final go-live of the projects with size varying from 2 to 35 Analysts, developers and leads.
highlights: Worked at various companies such as Knology Atlanta GA, Wachovia Corp, Merck Inc, Nielsen Schaumburg IL, UHG Singapore, and others
Handled end-to-end project execution using TIBCO MDM, TIBCO EMS, Business Works, Business Events, Smart Mapper , Core Java on Windows and UNIX platform.
